attributes.action: Adjust University Fees Accordingly for the Current Off-campus COVID  experience
attributes.additional_details: I am a University Student in Wales. When I graduate I am expected to pay back a total of 27k for Tuition Fees which I find to be unjust, especially when we are in the midst of a deadly Pandemic. Face-Timing 5 days a week, not having the proper access to reading materials in the University Library and being sent recordings of a lecture once a week is not what I/we are paying for. This is affecting all students across the 4 nations. I would like for Parliament to enforce fair changes for students.
attributes.background: Due to COVID-19 cases rising and universities opting to offer an off-campus learning system this year, students are now not going to be receiving the full university experience that they are paying for. They/We should be entitled to compensation or discounted fees reflecting the experience on offer.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
